post.body: lets put our heads together and support each other, 2009 is our year!
so good to have you as a friend. We will weather this econ downturn. Im K2 Scuba, so whatever lines I carry YOU now carry..
so tickled to have you as a friend on this happy Medium of tweetdom, teach me my compadre the ways of the "Boogie"
just read your 3 for GFC, PROFOUND, looking forward to learning from you. Thanks much and bring those tweets on!
I nominate @leeodden for a Shorty Award in #seo because of mentoring, & giving of salient information 4 free Rock on Rockstar!
I nominate @thubten for a Shorty Award in #seo because he is a giving educator & mentor of this elusive art/science
I nominate @waynesutton for a Shorty Award in #socialmedia because his insighful reporting is thoughtful and entertaining
thanks for becoming my friend on this amazing medium, I have a LOT to learn from you, let the revolution begin!
so good to be following you and thank you for becoming my friend, bless you for what you do! There is much to learn!
I nominate @CaliLewis for a Shorty Award in #education because she rocks, wonderful content that keeps coming!
, there is the tradeoff. You either have to make your profile accessible if it is a marketing tool, or lock it down for privacy
Dear @onwave thank you for becoming my friend, such beautiful pics. Tell me how I can support you as an indie film maker?
Rock On @crazystalkerguy, thank for becoming my friend, OK who are we going after next. . you lead, I will follow right behind you!
neeeed. . .to. . .let. . .go. . .and . . turn off the computer. G'night Tweetsters!
RT @JesseNewhart: 3 Ways To Use Google Friend Connect: http://bit.ly/VHao My gawd, this is one of the sentinel best uses of tweet thanks JN!
I just lucked upon Net Neutrality and saving the internet, am I new, or is this news to all of you? http://poprl.com/9wu
High Flight. . . of Innerspace! A Solemn Prayer for SCUBA & Freedivers http://ping.fm/GE7Ia
RT @mantablog: אנחנו ממש נשמח אם תבחרו בנו כצייצנים מצטיינים http://shortyawards.com/ החנקן עלינו Schweet, thank you!
Dear @jontv , I am grateful to have you as a friend on this happy medium, blessed holidays in this season o' bliss, excited to learn w/ U!
A blessed good morning all! Capture the day, it is the interim period between Xmas and New Years, eat all you want-calories don't count!
